Title: Relates to proposed rate changes for gas and electric service
Summary: Requires respective changes to service and delivery charges for gas or electric service to be included in the information regarding average proposed rate changes required to be published by the public service commission in certain instances.
LawCode: Amd ยง66, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to proposed rate changes for gas and electric service
